text: "It's My Life" is a 2000 song by the American rock band Bon Jovi and is the first single from their seventh studio album Crush. It went to number one in Austria, Belgium, Italy, the Netherlands, Portugal, Romania, Spain, and Switzerland, while reaching the top 10 in several countries and also went to number 33 in the United States. == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs
title: It's My Life (Bon Jovi song)
